metadata.title: CVE-2024-26736 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  afs: Increase buffer size in afs_update_volume_status()  The max length of volume->vid value is 20 characters. So increase idbuf[] size up to 24 to avoid overflow.  Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.  [DH: Actually, it's 20 + NUL, so increase it to 24 and use snprintf()]
